docs.lead_paragraph: The Police Commissioner believes New York is less safe. The Fire Commissioner fears greater risk to life. The Sanitation Commissioner sees a dirtier city.

headline.main: Not Much Is Certain, Except Dirty Streets; When a City Cuts Back Hard

docs.abstract: full impact of Mayor Beame's 'crisis budget' on munic services seen still uncertain; rev of layoffs and personnel reassignments in police, fire, sanitation, schools, higher educ, hosps, health, welfare, corrections, pks and library services (M)
docs.snippet: The Police Commissioner believes New York is less safe. The Fire Commissioner fears greater risk to life. The Sanitation Commissioner sees a dirtier city.
